name: BucketKnight
description:
Hello !

This is our first game jam :D

I hope you have fun with everyone's creations !

We imagined a mechanic where players have to trust each others with their lives. If you get hit by an enemy a friend of yours will take the damages in your stead.

BucketKnight controls :

-WASD

-Spacebar for attacks

-Return to get out of dialogue(s)

-Alt+f4 quit :^D

Thanks for your time,

Kisses <3

Ela, Tity, Ludzu
